DOC.brief_summary: Try collect 350 case acute necrotizing pancreatitis First Affiliated Hospital Nanjing Medical University Nanjing General Hospital Nanjing Military Command . Then investigator study incidence risk factor ARDS patient acute necrotizing pancreatitis .
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors ARDS Patients With Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Using electronic patient data monitoring system , investigator review patient diagnosis pancreatitis admit surgical ward ICUs First Affiliated Hospital Nanjing Medical University Nanjing General Hospital Nanjing Military Command January 1 , 2009 , October 31 , 2015 . Inclusion criterion adult patient ( age > 18 year ) acute necrotizing pancreatitis . Exclusion criterion follow : 1 ) lack radiologic evidence diagnose acute necrotizing pancreatitis , 2 ) presence ARDS admission hospital , 3 ) unable partner treatment leave hospital , 4 ) transfer investigator ' hospital treatment , 5 ) miss necessary data , 6 ) pregnancy . For enrolled patient , general clinical characteristic collect . Patients categorize two group accord ARDS non-ARDS , difference characteristics two group evaluate . Potential risk factor collect studied use multiple logistic regression analysis .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( age > 18 year ) acute necrotizing pancreatitis lack radiologic evidence diagnose acute necrotizing pancreatitis , presence ARDS admission hospital , unable partner treatment leave hospital , transfer investigator ' hospital treatment , miss necessary data , pregnancy .
